Package org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller

package org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.example.galaxy_trucker.Controller.Listeners
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    CardsController
    The CardsController class extends the abstract Controller class, responsible for managing the game actions and states related to the player's interaction with card-based mechanics.
    CheckValidityController
    The CheckValidityController class is responsible for handling game actions specific to the "Check Validity" state of a Player.
    ChoosePositionController
    The ChoosePositionController class is a specific implementation of the abstract Controller class.
    Controller
    The Controller class is an abstract representation of the game's state management and player interaction.
    DisconnectedClient
    The DisconnectedClient class represents a client that is currently disconnected in the system.
    FlightController
    The FlightController class is a specific implementation of the Controller class that represents a phase in the game where a player transitions through the "Flight" state.
    GameController
    The GameController class is responsible for managing the game's main state, including player interactions, commands, and overall game flow.
    LoginController
    LoginController is responsible for handling the login phase of the game.
    PostPrepController
    PostPrepController handles the state of the game after the preparation phase, allowing players to perform actions and transitioning to the next state when certain conditions are met.
    PrepController
    The PrepController class represents the preparation phase in the game's lifecycle.
    VirtualView
    The VirtualView class serves as a mediator between the client and the server, managing the communication of game events and state changes.
